head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths MURRAY, CHARLES P.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths MURRAY, CHARLES P.

block.p: MURRAY--Charles P. on January 10, 2007. Beloved husband of Eleanor. Also survived by brother Robert, sister Catherine Lyall; and many nieces and nephews. Reposing at the Nagel Funeral Home, 352 E. 87th St., NYC, Friday 2-4 and 7-9 PM. Mass of Christian Burial Saturday 10AM, at Saint Joseph Church of Yorkville. Burial Holy Cross Cemetery.
